description: Explore how open-source hardware contributes to sustainability with Infineon Technologies. Learn about resource efficiency, local manufacturing, and the circular economy in OSH. Discover Infineon's role in fostering sustainable innovation through modular platforms, power efficiency, and IoT support. Understand the challenges of OSH in sustainability and the promising future trends in this field.
keywords: open-source hardware, sustainability, Infineon Technologies, resource efficiency, circular economy, local manufacturing, IoT, community building, sustainable innovation, technology, energy management, decentralized manufacturing
title: Open Source Hardware and Sustainability: Infineon's Role in Shaping the Future
